turn_door.description: Turn the trashcan door to open or close.

turn_trashcan.description: Turn the trashcan to change its placement direction.

push_trashcan.description: Move the trashcan over the floor by pushing.

swipe_trashcan.description: Clean the trashcan body by wiping.

rotate_trashcan.description: Rotate the trashcan body to change its direction.

clean_all.description: Clean all the parts of the trashcan by wiping.

move_all.description: Move the whole trashcan including the door and body.

turn_all.description: Turn the whole trashcan including the door and body.

clean_door.description: To keep the door clean, wipe it regularly.

move_whole_trashcan.description: Move the entire trashcan including the trashcan body and door.

clean_trashcan_body.description: To keep the trashcan hygienic, clean it regularly.

press_door.description: Press the trashcan door to open or close it.

clean_whole_trashcan.description: Clean the entire trashcan including the trashcan body and door.
